summary: A test suite that validates the implementation of the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm and its associated transformation pass, checking approximation quality, exact decomposition behavior, error handling, default settings, identity circuit generation, plugin integration, basis‑gate representation, U‑gate support, and overall unitary synthesis capability.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of quantum compilation components that rely on the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm, thereby supporting reliable quantum software development and accurate circuit synthesis.
